checks.notes: Successfully navigated to Daily Wage Calculation page via Settings > Payroll. Page displays the configuration interface with three services: Salary proration, EOS leave encashment, and Unpaid leave deduction.
All three calculation basis options are present and selectable: Working days, Calendar days, and Custom days. Verified in the Month calculation dropdown of the Salary Proration dialog.
Salary components selection is present. The formula displays 'Basic salary + allowances' indicating the system allows configuration of which salary components to include in calculations.

System acknowledges variable month lengths through different divisors: Salary proration uses 30.45 days (average), EOS uses 22 days (working days), and Unpaid leave uses 30 days (calendar average). The Custom days option allows for month-specific calculations.
